meanings.sent1: Her unbecomingness behavior at the party embarrassed her friends.
meanings.sent2: Wearing pajamas to a job interview is considered unbecomingness.
meanings.sent3: The unbecomingness outfit she wore to the wedding made everyone chuckle.
meanings.sent4: His unbecomingness jokes during the serious meeting were like a clown at a funeral.
meanings.sent5: The unbecomingness painting clashed with the elegant decor of the room.

meanings.sent1: The unbecomingness of his actions was evident to everyone.
meanings.sent2: She was surprised by the unbecomingness of the situation.
meanings.sent3: The unbecomingness of the dog's attempt to catch its tail was amusing.
meanings.sent4: The unbecomingness of the storm reminded her of chaos in nature.
